projects.desc: A simple watch application that show times based on seconds and milliseconds with a custom clock dial with a laps history .

A movie app that shows details of a movie thats on the project with the ability to search for it and a category that you can use to select specific movies. To access the movie app you need to sign in , also you can use the demo account for a fast sing in
A To Do App that takes your To Do and append it to the application. It also have the ability to check a certain To Do and delete it
A famous Game Rock Paper Scissors that you play with the computer and the winner the one who gets the most points.
